CustomField.description: Indicates that the Duty Template is for Adhoc Bookings. Note that Adhoc Bookings created from the Gantt can only be created against Adhoc Duty Templates.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the Duty Template is for Adhoc Bookings. Note that Adhoc Bookings created from the Gantt can only be created against Adhoc Duty Templates.
CustomField.label: Is Adhoc
